trans_examp.trans_cn: 依然, 仍然, 仍旧

example.eg: He went out, while she remained at home.
example.egtrans: 他出去了，可她留在家里。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 依然在, 继续在, 继续在
剩下, 余下, 余下

example.eg: His remains are in the casket, and will be buried tomorrow.
example.egtrans: 他的遗体已入棺，明天就下葬。

example.eg: These stones are marked with the remains of prehistoric fish.
example.egtrans: 这些石头里有史前鱼类的化石。

example.eg: The remains of the ancient city were fascinating.
example.egtrans: 那座古城的遗迹太美了。

example.eg: After dinner, Don put the remains into containers and stored them in the refrigerator.
example.egtrans: 晚饭过后，唐把剩菜剩饭装进盒子放进冰箱里。

example.eg: The remains of an ancient civilization were discovered in southern France.
example.egtrans: 在法国南部发现了古代文明的遗迹。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 剩下的东西, 剩余物

example.eg: The remains from last season's clothes are on the discount rack.
example.egtrans: 上一季服装的存货正在货架上打折处理。

example.eg: When I participate in a survey, I prefer to remain anonymous.
He remained firm in the face of strong opposition.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 依然坚决, 依然坚定

example.eg: Switzerland remained neutral during the Second World War.
Please remain seated until the bus comes to a complete stop.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 处于就坐状态, 继续坐着

example.eg: Gemma remained silent throughout the entire discussion.
The man was seriously injured but doctors say his condition remains stable.
It's been said before, but the point remains valid.
